amendment.description: Amendment provides $100,000 for the Department of Education to expand its Website to include information on private scholarships and financial aid.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 2 in the Congressional Record of July 2, 1997, to provide $100,000,000 in funds for the Education Department to develop a website to provide information to students about scholarships and financial aid.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
